Texts.Chs: 这就是使用机甲的方式！我会给你足够的^green;备用资源^white;，让你通过开始研究^orange;工程学^reset;来建造自己的机甲！你还可以使用我的^orange;机甲组装台^white;来查看其工作方式。
Texts.Eng: And that's how you use a mech! I can give you enough ^green;spare resources^white; for you to get started building your own via ^orange;Engineering^reset;! You can also use my ^orange;mech assembly stations^white; to see how they work.
